name: Armor of God
description:
Take control of Paul Bishop as he struggles to close a portal that is letting Demons into his town. In this faith-inspired turn-based RPG, gather the pieces of the Armor of God by revisiting places from Paul's past.

Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Combat: Click on the option to use it.

Dodging / Attacking: Click anywhere on screen when the black bar is over the sword or the heart.

Open inventory: the i key or press the backpack in the upper right hand corner.

Tips:

If you do not like random encounters, they can be disabled in the settings menu. If you want to grind XP, you can set the random encounter rate to high.

Music and Sound levels can be adjusted in the settings menu, use it from the main menu or from the gear icon in game.

Mechanics:

Traditional Turn-based gameplay with the ability to time dodging or attacking correctly to deal or avoid damage.

Two health bars, mind and heart. You have to keep them both above 0% otherwise suffer a damage penalty.

Search around for the pieces of the "Armor of God" to enable you to fight the Demons.

Discover the past of Paul and learn how he becomes stronger through his connection with God.

The Armor of God Includes:

  • The Belt of Truth
  • Breastplate of Righteousness
  • Boots of Readiness
  • Shield of Faith
  • Helmet of Salvation
  • Sword of the Spirit

In the game, each of the Armor pieces has an active ability (can be used on a turn) and a passive ability (always in use).

Attributes: "FAITH"

  • Faith - Secret attribute, you must trust in it to see what it does.
  • Attack - For every level of Attack, gain 5% damage
  • Intelligence - For every level, add 5 hit points to your mind
  • Timing - For every level, add 1/10 of a second to the attack and dodge minigames
  • Heart - For every level, add 5 hit points to your mind

Credits:

Made for the Brackeys 2021.1 Game Jam.
